description.french: Tu as brisé le Verrou PHANTOM.
description.spanish: Has destruido el cerrojo de PHANTOM.

description.english: You destroyed the first PHANTOM Dome.
description.german: Du hast den ersten PHANTOM-Boss zerstört.
description.french: Tu as détruit le premier Colosse PHANTOM.
description.italian: Hai distrutto il primo Colosso PHANTOM.
description.spanish: Has destruido el primer robot PHANTOM.

description.english: You demolished the second PHANTOM Dome.
description.german: Du hast den zweiten PHANTOM-Boss vernichtet.
description.french: Tu as démoli le second Colosse PHANTOM.
description.italian: Hai demolito il secondo Colosso PHANTOM.
description.spanish: Has asolado el segundo robot PHANTOM.

description.english: You obliterated the third PHANTOM Dome.
description.german: Du hast den dritten PHANTOM-Boss in Grund und Boden gestampft.
description.french: Tu as anéanti le troisième Colosse PHANTOM.
description.italian: Hai annientato il terzo Colosso PHANTOM.
description.spanish: Has arrasado el tercer robot PHANTOM.

description.english: You defeated the PHANTOM Commander and thwarted the PHANTOM invasion!
description.german: Du hast den PHANTOM-Kommandanten besiegt und die PHANTOM-Invasion zurückgeschlagen!
description.french: Tu as vaincu le Commandant PHANTOM et repoussé l'invasion PHANTOM !
description.italian: Hai sconfitto il comandante del PHANTOM e sventato la minaccia d’invasione!
description.spanish: ¡Has derrotado al comandante PHANTOM y frustrado la invasión PHANTOM!

description.french: Tu possèdes actuellement 10 pots de Beurre de cacahuète.
description.spanish: Tienes 10 jarras de mantequilla de cacahuete.

description.english: You obtained 99 Peanut Butter Jars. I mean, that's a lot of Peanut Butter.
description.german: Du hast 99 Gläser Erdnussbutter erbeutet. Das ist ganz schön viel Erdnussbutter.
description.french: Tu as actuellement 99 pots de Beurre de cacahuète. Plein de Beurre de cacahuète, quoi.
description.italian: Hai 99 vasetti di burro d’arachidi. Insomma... un sacco di burro d’arachidi.
description.spanish: Tienes 99 jarras de mantequilla de cacahuete. Eso es un montón de mantequilla.

description.english: You rescued all the civilians in a stage.
description.german: Du hast alle Zivilisten in einem Abschnitt gerettet.
description.french: Tu as secouru tous les civils dans une étape.
description.italian: Hai salvato tutti i civili in un livello.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a todos los civiles en una fase.

description.english: You destroyed all the PHANTOM enemies in a stage.
description.german: Du hast alle PHANTOM-Gegner in einem Abschnitt zerstört.
description.french: Tu as détruit tous les Ennemis PHANTOM d'une étape.
description.italian: Hai distrutto tutti i nemici PHANTOM in un livello.
description.spanish: Has destruido a todos los enemigos PHANTOM en una fase.

description.english: You rescued all the civilians in a zone.
description.german: Du hast alle Zivilisten in einer Zone gerettet.
description.french: Tu as secouru tous les civils dans une zone.
description.italian: Hai salvato tutti i civili in una zona.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a todos los civiles en una zona.

description.english: You destroyed all the PHANTOM enemies in a zone.
description.german: Du hast alle PHANTOM-Gegner in einer Zone zerstört.
description.french: Tu as détruit tous les Ennemis PHANTOM d'une zone.
description.italian: Hai distrutto tutti i nemici PHANTOM in una zona.
description.spanish: Has destruido a todos los enemigos PHANTOM en una zona.

description.english: You rescued all the civilians in or around this island.
description.german: Du hast alle Zivilisten auf oder um diese Insel gerettet.
description.french: Tu as secouru tous les civils sur cette île ou autour.
description.italian: Hai salvato tutti i civili su quest’isola, o nei dintorni.
description.spanish: Has rescatado a todos los civiles que estaban en la isla o cerca de ella.

description.english: You obliterated every last PHANTOM enemy in or around this fair island!
description.german: Du hast sämtliche PHANTOM-Gegner auf dieser holden Insel und drumherum in Grund und Boden gestampft!
description.french: Tu as anéanti jusqu'au dernier ennemi PHANTOM sur cette belle île ou autour !
description.italian: Hai annientato fino all’ultimo nemico PHANTOM su questa bella isola, o nei dintorni!
description.spanish: ¡Has aniquilado a todos los enemigos PHANTOM en esta bella isla o cerca de ella!

description.english: You accomplished all of your Missions. You did it all. You are a supreme soldier. WE SALUTE YOU!
description.german: Du hast all deine Missionen erfüllt. Allesamt. Du bist ein hervorragender Soldat. HUT AB!
description.french: Tu as accompli toutes tes Missions. Tu as tout fini. T'es un soldat sensass. NOUS TE SALUONS !
description.italian: Hai completato tutte le missioni. Proprio tutte. Sei il soldato per eccellenza. TI RENDIAMO ONORE!
description.spanish: Has completado todas tus misiones. Lo has conseguido todo. Eres un soldado supremo. ¡TE ELOGIAMOS!
